work.position: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Data Science Team Leader
highlights: Fine-tuned a Vision LLM (Qwen2VL) model for golf scorecard extraction, achieving 83% higher accuracy than traditional OCR with just 30 samples.

Lead on Customer churn prediction with LightGBM offers over 78% accuracy while predicting 28.5% of the bank's overall customers.
